tool.name: LeapBuildLinearStructure
tool.description: : Wrapper of the AmberTools (AMBER MD Package) leap tool module.
tool.command:
#if $config.sele == "option1": ln -s -f ${config.properties} ${config.properties}_`echo $$`.${config.properties.ext}; #end if
leap_build_linear_structure
#if $config.sele == "option1": --config ${config.properties}.${config.properties.ext} #else if $config.sele == "option2": --config '${config.jsonstr}' #else if $config.sele == "option3": --config '__oc____dq__sequence__dq__:__dq__${properties.sequence}__dq__,__dq__forcefield__dq__:__ob____dq__${'__dq__,__dq__'.join($properties.forcefield)}__dq____cb__,__dq__build_library__dq__:${properties.build_library},__dq__binary_path__dq__:__dq__${properties.binary_path}__dq____cc__' #end if
--output_pdb_path $outname_output_pdb_path ; #if $config.sele == "option1": rm -f ${config.properties}_`echo $$`.${config.properties.ext}; #end if
if test -f $outname_output_pdb_path; then mv $outname_output_pdb_path $output_pdb_path; fi;

param.name: sele
param.label: Take tool settings:
param.help: Select where tool settings are to be read from

param.name: properties
param.label: Configuration file
param.help: File containing tool settings. See below for the syntax

param.name: jsonstr
param.label: JSON string
param.help: JSON string containing tool settings. See below for the syntax

param.name: sequence
param.label: sequence
param.help: Aminoacid sequence to convert to a linear 3D structure. Aminoacids should be written in 3-letter code, with a blank space between them.
param.value: ALA GLY SER PRO ARG ALA PRO GLY

param.name: forcefield
param.label: forcefield
param.help: Forcefield to be used for the structure generation.

param.name: build_library
param.label: build_library
param.help: Generate AMBER lib file for the structure.

param.name: binary_path
param.label: binary_path
param.help: Path to the tleap executable binary.

tool.help:
.. class:: infomark
Check the syntax for the tool parameters at the original library documentation: https://biobb_amber.readthedocs.io/en/latest
